title: Confirm Vessel's Readiness to Sail
description: Before scheduling departure services, the operator must confirm the vessel has completed all cargo work and received customs clearance.

tasks.description: Check the TOS to confirm cargo operations are complete.
tasks.expected_outcome: Operator verifies the vessel status is 'Cargo Complete'.

tasks.description: Check the customs system to confirm the vessel has received 'outward clearance'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Operator verifies the vessel has clearance to depart.

tasks.description: Once both are confirmed, contact the vessel agent to begin arranging the departure.
tasks.expected_outcome: With all prerequisites met, the operator starts the departure scheduling process.
